[bq="cb5"]Since derpibooru is a huge site, with a huge userbase why not instead and often times on sites and such it's extremely easy to get off topic and drift into general chit chat about how someone's day was or such why not just have a thread here for miscellaneous discussions or such.

Basically if you just want to chat or something about whatever with other people.[/bq][/bq]
